title: WeCare Diabetes
description:
WeCare Diabetes offers a fast and straightforward way to manage the health and lifestyle of diabetic patients. Our platform assists you in collecting and organizing your digital health data and reports. Connect with a health coach to review your condition and get recommendations for consulting your doctor. With your digital health data readily accessible, your diagnosis and in-clinic experience will be significantly enhanced.

Glucose Logging:

Track your glucose levels effortlessly with our easy-to-use logging feature. Keep a detailed history of your readings to monitor trends and share with your healthcare provider for better management.

Abnormality Reports:

Record any abnormal glucose readings or health parameters. Stay informed and take proactive steps to address potential health concerns quickly.

Vitals:

Monitor your vital signs such as blood pressure and heart rate regularly. Easily log and track these metrics to maintain a comprehensive overview of your health.

Lab Tests:

Store and manage your lab test results securely within the app. Access and review your lab data anytime to stay informed about your health status.

Weight Tracking:

Keep an accurate record of your weight changes over time with our tracking feature. Set goals and monitor progress to support your overall health and diabetes management.

Sleep and Moods:

Log your sleep patterns and mood fluctuations to identify potential impacts on your diabetes. Gain insights into how sleep and emotional well-being affect your overall health.

Clinical Documents:

Securely store and access all your important clinical documents in one place. Easily share your medical records with your healthcare team as needed.

Contents:

Explore a wealth of educational content tailored to diabetes management. Stay informed with articles, tips, and guides to help you better understand and manage your condition.

Glucometer Integration:

WeCare Diabetes supports various devices like Accu-Chek® and Contour® glucometers, ensuring seamless integration. These FDA-cleared devices offer reliable readings and are compatible with most regions, subject to local regulations.
